de.mrapp.android.adapter.expandablelist.sortable

Interface ExpandableListSortingListener<GroupType,ChildType>

  • Type Parameters:
    GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the observed adapter's group items
    ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the observed adapter's child items

    public interface ExpandableListSortingListener<GroupType,ChildType>
    Defines the interface, all listeners, which should be notified when the underlying data of an ExpandableListAdapter have been sorted, must implement.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChildrenSorted(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, java.util.Collection<ChildType> sortedChildren, Order order, java.util.Comparator<ChildType> comparator, GroupType group, int groupIndex)
      The method, which is invoked, when the child items of a group of the adapter have been sorted.
      void onGroupsSorted(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter, java.util.Collection<GroupType> sortedGroups, Order order, java.util.Comparator<GroupType> comparator)
      The method, which is invoked, when the adapter's group items have been sorted.

    • Method Detail

      • onGroupsSorted

        void onGroupsSorted(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                    java.util.Collection<GroupType> sortedGroups,
                    Order order,
                    java.util.Comparator<GroupType> comparator)
        The method, which is invoked, when the adapter's group items have been sorted.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        sortedGroups - A collection, which contains the adapter's sorted group items, as an instance of the type Collection or an empty collection, if the adapter does not contain any group items
        order - The order, which has been used to sort the adapter's group items, as a value of the enum Order. The order may either be ASCENDING or DESCENDING
        comparator - The comparator, which has been used to compare the single group items, as an instance of the type Comparator or null, if the group items' implementation of the type Comparable has been used instead

      • onChildrenSorted

        void onChildrenSorted(ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> adapter,
                      java.util.Collection<ChildType> sortedChildren,
                      Order order,
                      java.util.Comparator<ChildType> comparator,
                      GroupType group,
                      int groupIndex)
        The method, which is invoked, when the child items of a group of the adapter have been sorted.
        Parameters:
        adapter - The observed adapter as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter. The adapter may not be null
        sortedChildren - A collection, which contains the group's sorted child items, as an instance of the type Collection or an empty collection, if the group does not contain any child items
        order - The order, which has been used to sort the group's child items, as a value of the enum Order. The order may either be ASCENDING or DESCENDING
        comparator - The comparator, which has been used to compare the single child items, as an instance of the type Comparator or null, if the child items' implementation of the type Comparable has been used instead
        group - The group, whose child items have been sorted, as an instance of the generic type GroupType. The group may not be null
        groupIndex - The index of the group, whose child items have been sorted, as an Integer value
